name: Gnome
overview: Get to the letter on each level using the elevators avoiding the witch, when you get to the letter you can follow the executioner behind the letter and you can take it to the pegs on the bottom level and hang the letter. Remember that you can switch to the background pane to go behind objects like stairs, behind the elevator shafts and the letter area. Once you get all the letters you can form a word. Watch out, the witch can shoot lightening at you, freezing you in place. Published in Go Games n.5 (January 1986) as Gnomo.
